text: The first submarine transatlantic telephone cable system, TAT-1 was inaugurated, replacing slow telegraph and unreliable radio systems.
Apple announced the release of Mac OS X 10.1 Puma, the first major upgrade to OS X.
Blizzard launched its 4th World of Warcraft expansion, called Mists of Pandaria.
Amazon announced the Kindle HDX tablets with a service called "Mayday" that promised to let users peak with a real person by video over the Internet within 15 seconds of tapping a button.
